Events that occurred on 24 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1923 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1930 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1934 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1935 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a postcard to Miss Kilbride.
1939 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1940 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1941 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 93.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Patricia Kirke.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Eileen Elgar.
1987 - Producer Terence Tiller dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
